entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 7:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
